com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps
Class Session

java.lang.Object
  com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps.Session

public class Session
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a players session at this virtual craps table. The user will be prompted to buy chips, place bets, roll the dice, etc. The player is able to play an unlimited number of games within the session, until the chose to quit or thier chips run out. Player may place any number of bets, either for (Pass or Come), against (Don't Pass or Don't Come) the game, or bets that are not dependent on the game being won or lost (Proposition bet). Some bets will span multiple games, which requires the program design to keep bets and games independent of one another.

Author:
Doug Chuchro (doug@chuchro.net)

Method Detail

play

public void play()
Primary method of the Session class, cycles through a series of games, takes bets, and manages the chip count.

promptPrePointBet

private LineBet promptPrePointBet()
Prompt the player for a bet prior to the new game's come out roll.

Returns:
LineBet is the bet that the player has placed, either Pass Line or Don't Pass bet.

promptSubsequentBets

private void promptSubsequentBets()
Prompt the player for additional bets after the point of the game has been established, which could be one or more of the following bets: Come Line, Don't Come, Place, Proposition.

checkBets

private int checkBets(Dice dice)
Iterates through the List of bets, checking to see if the dice just rolled won or lost the bet.

Parameters:
dice - Most current roll of the dice.
Returns:
The winnings amount to be added to the player's chipCount.

hasOpenBets

private boolean hasOpenBets()
Determine if the player has any open bets.

Returns:
TRUE if the player has open bets, FALSE if not.
